#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define fo(i,x,y) for (int i = x; i < y; i++)
#define fd(i,x,y) for(int i = x; i>= y; i--)
#define ll long long
#define clr(A,x) memset(A, x, sizeof A)
#define pb push_back
#define mod 1000000007
#define debug(x) cout <<#x << " = " << x << endl
#define ha cout<<"Hanako"<<endl
#define ci cout<<"Ciel"<<endl

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   //freopen("D:\input.txt","r",stdin);
   int n,k;
   cin>>n>>k;
   vector<int> dates(n);
   fo(i,0,n)
   {
       cin>>dates[i];
   }
   int nega=n-k;
   sort(dates.begin(),dates.end());
   fo(i,0,nega)
   {
       dates[i]=dates[i]*-1;
   }
   int ans=0;
   fo(i,0,n)
   {
       ans+=dates[i];
   }
   cout<<ans<<endl;
}
